title: code.google.com/p/go: SSL mixed content warnings
body:
A few of Go's Google Code pages trigger SSL mixed content warnings due to embedding
http:// images.  E.g., these two pages:

    https://code.google.com/p/go/
    https://code.google.com/p/go/wiki/Source?tm=4

both link to http://golang.org/doc/gopher/bumper480x270.png, when they could instead
link to https://golang.org/doc/gopher/bumper480x270.png.

Relatedly, https://code.google.com/p/go/wiki/Downloads?tm=2 should link to
https://golang.org/dl/ instead of http://golang.org/dl/ (see also issue #8705).

(I think these need to be fixed by someone with project admin permissions.)
